decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3afe5916-7fff-b4ce-7c3b-1c39d9268313"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">A scheme for the provision and implementation of flood resilient and resistant construction details and measures for the basement and lightwells against surface water (overland flow) flood risk shall be submitted to and agreed, in writing with the LPA in consultation with the LLFA prior to the construction of the measures. The scheme shall be carried out in its entirety before the basement is occupied and; constructed and completed in accordance with the approved plans in line with current best practices.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3afe5916-7fff-b4ce-7c3b-1c39d9268313"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: </span></span>To prevent surface water flooding.</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-bb5d0284-7fff-3ebc-de82-28c891424b73"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification, a drainage layout and a management &amp; maintenance plan (where applicable) of the water butt with overflow shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume. </span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-bb5d0284-7fff-3ebc-de82-28c891424b73"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: <span style="font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space-collapse: collapse;">To ensure the provision of suitable SUDS onsite to aid in reducing surface water.</span><br></span></span><br></p>

<p>All new development in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match the materials as detailed in drawings no.&nbsp; P108 and P109 dated August 2023.</p><p>REASON: To ensure the development integrates with the host building and the surrounding area.&nbsp;</p>
description: Installation of steps within existing front lightwell to access basement and removal of existing railings; alterations to fenestrations along the rear elevation including replacement of 2x windows with timber-framed sash windows at first-floor level and installation of crittal windows and doors at ground and basement floors; partial excavation of rear garden to create sunken terrace; installation of railings at ground-floor level; installation of rooflight (amended description).
